name: Dragon's Lunch
description: Dragon's Lunch - the real time Roguelike game. Explore the depths to get your golf ball back, but be careful you don't end up as Dragon's Lunch!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
